name: Learning License(LLR)
detail: Learner license before they begin practising driving

name: Driving License
detail: When driving in a public space .They need to have their own license.

name: Vehicle Registration
detail: RTO before it receives the go ahead to be driven on road.

name: Address Modify
detail: If vehicle owners are changing their address.They have to make this change on the vehicle documents.

name: Driving License Renewal
detail: Driver's licenses have an expiration date and need to be renewed after the verification.

name: Vehicle Insurance
detail: Company which offers comprehensive motor/vehicle insurance policies for car,two wheeler and commercial vehicles.
